body:
I am getting an optifine cape in the very near future and i was tryin to think of a cool banner design to use and i thought that it would be cool for like a server cape, like the avicus shield on the cape.
I cant do anything art related for my life but i thought someone that can do this kinda thing with spare time can make a community cape.

title: Cool Idea (AV Cape)

replies.body: 5zig capes allow you to put custom pictures on it. This was like Nodus Capes back in Beta.
replies.body_tagged: 5zig capes allow you to put custom pictures on it. This was like Nodus Capes back in Beta.

replies.body: This would be awesome! There could be capes that denote Donors, Staff, and regular users could get them to show their Avicus pride!
replies.body_tagged: This would be awesome! There could be capes that denote Donors, Staff, and regular users could get them to show their Avicus pride!

replies.body: I do like this capes idea!! :D +1
replies.body_tagged: I do like this capes idea!! :D +1

replies.body: Pretty sure you can't fully customize your cape. You are given a handful or so of designs and you can choose what color, but you can't customize each and every pixel to your liking.
replies.body_tagged: Pretty sure you can't fully customize your cape. You are given a handful or so of designs and you can choose what color, but you can't customize each and every pixel to your liking.

replies.body: Like what mooch said, there are certain designs you choose from. Not really sure how this is going to work out. :3
replies.body_tagged: Like what mooch said, there are certain designs you choose from. Not really sure how this is going to work out. :3
